turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. Hello. I'd like to order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a Cordusio Grande?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'll take a splash of coconut milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have some whipped cream added to the top of it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a Grande hot Cordusio with a splash of coconut milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which Starbucks did you want to order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order it at the Wilkes-Barre Starbucks on Main Road?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all. Thank you.
